translations: 竞争对手；[劳经]竞争者（competitor 的复数）

sentences.sentence: We are now outselling all our competitors.
sentences.translation: 我们现在比所有竞争对手都卖得多。

sentences.sentence: We cannot afford to drop behind our competitors.
sentences.translation: 我们可担当不起落后于竞争对手的后果。

sentences.sentence: They needed to make up ground on their competitors.
sentences.translation: 他们必须穷追猛赶竞争对手。
